Jackson.Temple B'Nai Israel (Jackson, Tennessee):
Congregation B'nai Israel is a historic synagogue at 401 W. Grand Street in Jackson, Tennessee, housing a Reform Jewish congregation.
The B'nai Israel congregation was chartered in 1885. In its early years, the congregation conducted services in some of homes of its members and in a hall above M. Tuchfeld's store (more recently known as Kisber's Department Store).
